name: chatgpt_gdb_length_750_for_long_bags
description: [ChatGPT] GDB 750mm length for long bag filters (635mm depth)
query: I need a GDB housing 600x600, FZ material, airflow 3400 mÂ³/h. The filter is an AIRPOCKET ECO bag filter with 635mm depth. Which housing length do I need?

turns.content: I need a GDB housing 600x600, FZ material, airflow 3400 mÂ³/h. The filter is an AIRPOCKET ECO bag filter with 635mm depth. Which housing length do I need?

The requested GDB housing configuration is not feasible with standard components.The GDB housing is limited to lengths of 550mm and 750mm. A 900mm housing length is not a valid option.Unfortunately, no standard catalog product can simultaneously meet the 600x600mm size requirement and accommodate the 635mm filter depth, which would require a 900mm housing length.I recommend contacting our Custom Engineering or Technical Support team with these specific technical requirements. They can assess the feasibility of a custom solution.

gemini.explanation: The system failed to identify a valid standard configuration. It incorrectly claimed that a 635mm deep filter requires a 900mm housing and cannot fit in a GDB, whereas the catalog explicitly states the GDB 750mm length supports filters up to 650mm depth. This hallucinated constraint caused the system to block a valid request.

dimension_explanations.correctness: The system falsely claimed a 635mm filter requires a 900mm housing; PDF page 3 states GDB 750mm length supports 'Filter max 650mm'.
dimension_explanations.completeness: The system failed to answer the user's question ('Which housing length do I need?') with the correct answer (750mm), instead stating it was impossible.
dimension_explanations.safety: The response was conservative and safe, blocking the configuration rather than suggesting an unsafe one.
dimension_explanations.tone: The tone was professional and helpful, despite the factual error.
dimension_explanations.reasoning_quality: The logic was flawed because it relied on an incorrect premise regarding filter depth capacity.
dimension_explanations.constraint_adherence: The system enforced a non-existent constraint, failing to adhere to the actual product capabilities listed in the catalog.

strengths: Correctly identified that GDB is not available in 900mm length (though this was not actually required)
weaknesses: Hallucinated a constraint that 635mm filters require 900mm housing
Blocked a valid standard catalog product (GDB 600x600 L=750mm)
Failed to verify 'Filter max' specs on PDF page 3

reasoning_paths.path: Material locked to FZ -> Filter 600x600mm -> Sized to 600x600 -> Length 750mm -> Weight 34.0kg -> Code: GDB-600x600-900-R-PG-FZ

content_segments.text: The requested GDB housing configuration is not feasible with standard components.
The GDB housing is limited to lengths of 550mm and 750mm. A 900mm housing length is not a valid option.
Unfortunately, no standard catalog product can simultaneously meet the 600x600mm size requirement and accommodate the 635mm filter depth, which would require a 900mm housing length.
I recommend contacting our Custom Engineering or Technical Support team with these specific technical requirements. They can assess the feasibility of a custom solution.
